homepageContent: Here is some content in English.
저희는 각자의 분야에서 개발자로 있으며 각기 다른 전문 분야에서 경험을: We are a team of developers working in various fields, each with experience in different specialized areas. With a passion for and curiosity about blockchain technology, we run a community that selects and develops blockchain projects as a hobby.
블록체인 기술의 잠재력과 가능성에 매료된 우리는, 이 혁신적인 기술을 활: Fascinated by the potential and possibilities of blockchain technology, we aim to harness this innovative technology to create a better world. By selecting projects based on diverse ideas and leveraging our individual expertise and experience, we seek to deepen our understanding of blockchain technology and share its value with more people.
우리는 블록체인 기술이 단순한 유행을 넘어, 투명성과 신뢰성을 제공하고: We believe that blockchain technology is more than just a trend; it is a crucial tool that provides transparency and reliability, bringing innovation to various industries. Our goal is to promote these values through our projects and enable more people to benefit from blockchain technology.
저희 프로젝트에 관심을 가져주셔서 감사합니다. 더 자세한 정보나 협업 문: Thank you for your interest in our project. For more information or collaboration inquiries, please feel free to contact us at the following:
1. 지갑 방문 페이지에서 거래하려는 계정을 사용 중인지 확인한 후 화면: 1. From the landing page of your wallet, make sure you're in the account from which you want to transact, and hit the 'send' button in the middle of the screen.
2. 이제 수령인의 공용 주소를 입력해야 합니다. 주소록에 이미 주소를: 2. Now you need to input the public address of the recipient. If you already have addresses saved in your address book, they will appear now.
3. Enter the amount of tokens you want to send and click next.
4. 이제 거래의 예상 가스 요금이 표시되며, 이 요금은 조정할 수 있습: 4. Now you're presented with the estimated gas fees of your transaction, which you can also adjust. Double-checking the recipient address before clicking 'Confirm' to proceed with the transaction is generally a good idea.
5. 그러면 '작업' 탭에서 최근 거래 목록을 볼 수 있는 메인 페이지로: 5. You will then be redirected to the homepage, where you can see a list of your recent transactions on the 'Activity' tab.
1. From anywhere in MetaMask, click the wallet actions button in the middle of the tab bar. From here, tap the'send' button.
2. 이제 보낼 주소를 입력해야 합니다. 클립보드의 주소(ex. 다른 앱: 2. Now you'll need to input the address you want to send to. Either paste in the address from your clipboard (i.e. another app) or select one from your address book.
3. 이제 보낼 금액을 입력할 수 있는 화면으로 이동하십시오. 필요한 경: 3. Now you'll be taken to a screen where you can input the amount you want to send. You can also change the token type if needed by tapping its name in the blue box directly above the amount.
4. '다음'을 누르면 확인 화면이 표시됩니다. 여기에 결제할 가스 요금: 4. When you tap 'Next', you will see the confirmation screen. Here you will see the details of your transaction, including the gas fee you're going to pay.
5. 또한 '예상 가스 요금' 박스에서 강조 표시된 이더리움 수량을 눌러:
5. You can also edit your gas settings for the transaction by tapping the highlighted quantity of ETH in the 'Estimated gas fee' box.
 Tap'send' to confirm the transaction and finish the process.
